version_description: Optimizations and improvements
Minor bug fixes plus optimisations and improvements

- Loading times should be shorter now - up to 4x faster loading with a large base
- Facility buildings and national flags added
- Particular push notifications can be managed in settings
- Notification for a new message in chat now appears upon r

- Donation of support operations in Alliance UX improved
- PvP matchmaking of new players improved
- Drone traps missing air units fixed
- Rewarded video ads added in Vault

- Base editor for easier base adjustments added
- Mailbox system for handling more messages added
- Training battles between alliance members added
- Issue with Pillbox not reflecting rank of units fixed
- Units rebalanced and Hexacopter Drone

- Weekend Challenge missions added
- Online/Offline status of players in alliance chat added
- Rescue Operation adjusted - it triggers automatically now
- Soldier units can now gain experience up to a maximum rank 15
- Issue with PCML unit in

• New feature added: Faction Wars
- New game mode supporting both PvP and single player oriented style of playing
- New separated faction leaderboard
- Clouds and Flames factions
- New island and environment for faction conflict
• General bug fixes

- Mines not displayed correctly in replay videos were fixed
- Critical issue with server connectivity fixed
- Skip button for tutorial added
- Season terrains switched back to normal
- General bug fixes

- Daily reward system added
- Facebook integrated in the game
- Option to invite others via Facebook and share in-game achievements added
- Russian language added
- Stability of the game improved
- General bug fixes

- Unit AI in battles fixed

- User avatars added
- Units rebalanced – soldier units adjusted to be more useful in high-level combat, drone traps damage increased
- UI adjusted and improved
- General bug fixes
